overview: XConfessions and Erika Lust bring the 19th volume of the XConfessions series. This most recent chapter is provocative, humorous and romantic, focusing on female pleasure, couple's fantasies and fetish. Included: Female Pleasure Circle; It Takes 3 to Tango; The MILF Next Door; Faithful Dogs; Wanderlust; #VanLifeDiaries; Pregnancy Sex Doc.
title: XConfessions 19
